entry.title: After Direct Hit, Arkansas Town Surveys Tornado's Wreckage
entry.content: The town of Wynne sustained heavy damage from the system of storms that swept through the Midwest and South.

entry.title: Rising Atlantic Ocean Engulfs Fishing Town in Brazil
entry.content: Climate change has increased sea levels, scientists say, and Atafona is an extreme example of the challenge that lies ahead in a country with some 4,600 miles of coastline.

entry.title: Storm System Kills at Least 26 People Across Central U.S.
entry.content: Fueled by a series of rotating thunderstorms, the system felled trees and power lines and battered homes across at least eight states.
